short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension hides applicant count in the Job section of LinkedIn. Icons designed by Freepik

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock your full potential on LinkedIn with the "Hide Applicants Count" Chrome extension. Are you tired of feeling overwhelmed by the sheer number of applicants for job postings? Do you find yourself getting discouraged or stressed when you see a high applicant count? We understand how this can affect your confidence and hinder your ability to respond effectively.

Introducing "Hide Applicants Count" â€“ your secret weapon to regaining control and boosting your confidence on LinkedIn. This extension empowers you to focus on what truly matters: crafting tailored responses and showcasing your unique qualifications, without the distraction of application numbers.

After you have installed the extension, the extension seamlessly hides the number of applicants displayed on job postings. By eliminating the visual pressure of a large applicant count, you can concentrate on your own skills, experiences, and achievements. This simple yet powerful tool allows you to break free from the stress and self-doubt that often accompanies the job search process.

Key Features:

- Conceal Applicant Numbers: Say goodbye to anxiety-inducing application counts. The extension hides the total number of applicants, enabling you to concentrate on your personal strengths and qualifications.

- Enhanced Confidence: By removing the constant reminder of a crowded applicant pool, you can regain your confidence and approach each job application with a positive mindset.

- Personalized Responses: Unleash your creativity and devote more time to crafting personalized responses to job postings. Without the distraction of numbers, you can focus on highlighting your unique value proposition to potential employers.

- Stress-Free Job Search: Experience a stress-free job search process by eliminating the pressure associated with high application counts. Engage in meaningful conversations and interactions, confident in your abilities and qualifications.

Don't let the number of applicants define your job search journey. Take control of your LinkedIn experience with the "Hide Applicants Count" Chrome extension. Experience a renewed sense of confidence, focus, and peace of mind as you navigate the job market. Start your journey to career success today!

"Hide Applicants Count" doesn't show ads and doesn't send users' data anywhere. It's fully open-source: https://github.com/onnobos/curiosity-lab-source-code/tree/main/linkedin-hide-applicants-extension.

Note: This extension is designed solely for hiding the applicant count on LinkedIn job postings. It does not interfere with any other functionality of the LinkedIn platform.
